website_summaries.verdict: Another high-grade set that's a little cheaper.
pros: Customers rave about the pair's sleek design, sturdy weight, and razor-sharp edges
Includes storage sheath to protect the blade
cons: Some buyers claim the set became dull quicker than they would have liked

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality & THE BEST Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this set is exceptional. The fork is very well balanced and compliments the knife, which is like a work of art. This is my 14th knife from Dalstrong and will be used to spin up a catering company in the near future. The Dalstrong whetstones will keep the edges "screamingly sharp"! We will butcher our own meats (buying in bulk is the most economical way to go), and several of the knives will be indispensable to our work. We will be purchasing additional knives as we add employees in our small family business. I highly recommend these knives and the company behind them - a LIFETIME Warranty on all products!
customer_reviews.author: Nila

customer_reviews.title: Well made knives and they glide through the food!
customer_reviews.text: These knives are really great. My husband is the one who does most of the cooking because of my chronic pain, I am not able to stand long!! I did use the knives to cut tomatoes and onions and they were wonderful for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: SHARP, SHARP, SHARP!!!
customer_reviews.text: Recently used it to carve a brisket roast. Unbelievably smooth and easy. Be very careful, knife is extremely sharp and you don't want to touch it to your finger as I did. Not used to using an Uber sharp knife. Will be wary in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Edward R. Abramson

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Great knife! we smoke a lot of briskets, ribs, and many other types of meat. This has been great for slicing and has maintained its edge. easy to clean and put away as we kept the original box it came in for storage away from kids.
customer_reviews.author: soonergal5

customer_reviews.title: Don’t miss he positive enjoy,ent of these knives!
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived perfectly. We ordered the steak knifes and the serrated offset bread and deli knife also. We started using our knives immediately and are amazed by them and continue to be amazed by their balance, sharpness, design and all around usefulness. We love them and are so happy we found them (thanks to my husband’s research) and made the investment! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Far better than the department store knives i previously owned. They are sharp enough to get the job done with ease. Bought two other sets and gave them away as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Wayburn

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Cut through the Thanksgiving Turkey and Ham like a hot knife through butter.
customer_reviews.author: Casual Reader

customer_reviews.title: best knives ever I love my knives can't wait to ...
customer_reviews.text: best knives ever I love my knives can't wait to use them makes carving a joy went though a prime rib roast like butter and when you can slice a brisket without ripping it apart after an 18 hour cook is great can't wait to buy my next shogun series knives
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: and a beautiful set of cutlery
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time, extremely well packaged, and a beautiful set of cutlery! Extremely sharp and well balanced. Can't wait to add to my collection and great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro J. Veralli

customer_reviews.title: High quality and great value
customer_reviews.text: Description of product was accurate. Very high quality and reasonably priced. May investigate other products from Dalstrong in the future.
customer_reviews.author: R. Badzinski

customer_reviews.title: Love the knife! The fork leaves a few things to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife! It’s beautiful, elegant, and usable for all carving purposes. The fork has a few aesthetic flaws but it still functions as intended. I honestly expected a better finish on the fork but maybe I’m just being too picky.
customer_reviews.author: AYang

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful knife, but I used it at work as ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful knife, but I used it at work as I am a carved at work. We serve prime rib and the knife lost its edge pretty fast. I took it to the steel and it hardly helped at all. This is the first time I have ever used this knife. I don't know if the knife is defective or it just doesn't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: I bought this set to humor my cooking habit. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to humor my cooking habit. I brought it to a company potluck (I made prime rib), and everyone commented on the look and feel. It really is a marvelous set.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: Great carving set!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful knife set. Extremely sharp. Made carving up Thanksgiving Turkey a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse S.

customer_reviews.title: a truly great knife at any price
customer_reviews.text: After my first Dalstrong (8" Shogun Series X Chef's knife) I had to try another. Again, a truly great knife at any price. At this price it is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Murray

customer_reviews.title: Keeping the blade sharp and a great feel to the handle
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of both blade and handle very good ergonomics. Love the quality of the blade
customer_reviews.author: Bruce J Sharp

customer_reviews.title: These are VERY sharp but have great handles for stability in uses
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST Carving knife and Fork set I have ever seen and used. Eautiful in its looks and presentation and extremely sharp. The sharpest lives I have ever owned. I shwitched from ZWILLING J.A. Henckels knives I purchased 20 years ago to the Dalstrong and I could not be happier. These are betting looking and sharper than the ZWILLING set.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Best carving set ever
customer_reviews.text: Dalstrong knives are top quality. The carving set is my 6th Dalstrong purchase. They are all excellent. The blades are razor sharp out of the box and the feel of the knife is excellent. The knives have a good "heft" to them and give the feel of quality. The Shogun series of knives are really beautiful. All in all the Dalstrong knives are more than worth every penny, they are even better than my Henckle or Wustof knives.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice set I use for serving and carving all meats
customer_reviews.author: D Macc

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best knife I've ever owned. Razor sharp, well balanced and looks good. It feels very comfortable in your hand. I have recommended this to knife to my family and friends. Looking forward to seeing what else they make to expand my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: A Dream to Use
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded to several of these knives and they are fabulous. They cut so beautifully, are so attractive and are nicely weighted. We will eventually replace all of our knives with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: Beauty
customer_reviews.text: Very nice addition to complete the presentation. Super sharp, super strong, perfect handle. A thing of beauty.
customer_reviews.author: gordon collier

customer_reviews.title: Great service and awesome knife!
customer_reviews.text: Great and fantastic knife! Love using it and better yet, customer service is top notch from Dalstrong!
customer_reviews.author: Dara

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Customer service and product.
customer_reviews.text: Had a few questions about the product and customer service was very quick to answer all my needs. Fantastic products and unbelievable customer service. Have won my business for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have been useing them for a while now and are exactly as described. Looking forward to adding more!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Caron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set great value and quality that I have not seen replicated anywhere
customer_reviews.author: NathanRH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful knife, very sharp out of the box, love it wil definitely buy another
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Head

product_meta.title: DALSTRONG Carving Knife & Fork Set - Shogun Series - Damascus 9" - Japanese AUS-10V Super Steel - Sheath
feature_bullets: A Dalstrong culinary revolution combining outstanding and award-winning craftsmanship, cutting-edge breakthrough technology, awe-inspiring design, and the absolute best materials available. Peak performance never looked so good at this price.

Unrivaled Performance: Ruthlessly sharp scalpel like edge is hand finished within a staggering 8-12°degree angle per side. Nitrogen cooled for enhanced harness, flexibility and corrosion resistance. Full tang for superb robustness and triple riveted for even more resilience. 9" length ideal for briskets, roasts, ham, turkey, and more. Matching carving fork with G10 handle and mosaic included. Perfect for holiday feasts.

Dalstrong Power: Ultra sharp AUS-10V Japanese super steel cutting core at 62+ Rockwell hardness for extraordinary performance and edge retention. 66 layers of premium high-carbon stainless steel for exceptional strength, durability and stain resistance. Perfectly balanced, the precisely tapered blade minimizes surface resistance. The narrow shape of the blades allows the knife to easily follow the contours of bone and get in-between difficult to reach areas.

Engineered to Perfection: Ultra-premium G-10 handle is impervious to heat, cold and moisture. Military grade with life-long durability. Handpolished ergonomic handle shape is engineered for superior hand control, agility and comfort.

Dalstrong Trust: We know you'll love it! 100% SATISFACTION OR MONEY BACK GUARANTEE, try it risk free. LIFETIME WARRANTY against defect. Renowned Dalstrong customer service. See why chef’s, butchers, bakers, culinary students and home cooks around the world trust and love, ‘The Dalstrong Difference’. Now you are slicing with POWER. Dalstrong POWER!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars99 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
